Tokisaki:CastleThatEatTime.NAME: Castle that eat time
Tokisaki:CastleThatEatTime.FLAVOR: It's the best way to make up for shadows(time).
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of my turn, get #yTokisaki:Shadow #b1.

Tokisaki:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

Tokisaki:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
Tokisaki:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

Tokisaki:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

Tokisaki:ProperMeal.NAME: A Proper Meal
DESCRIPTIONS: When an enemy dies from #yTokisaki:Corrosion , your maximum health increases by 5 additionally.

Tokisaki:CatToy.NAME: Cat Toy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of my turn, get #yTokisaki:Cat #b1.

Tokisaki:CastleThatBingeTime.NAME: Castle that binge time
Tokisaki:CastleThatBingeTime.FLAVOR: If you eat a shadow, you can eat a person too, right?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of my turn, Heal Tokisaki:Shadow (Max 3) hp.
